Variables
SharpNeat.​NeuralNets.​Double.​Vectorized
namespace SharpNeat.NeuralNets.Double.Vectorized
NeuralNetCyclic
IBlackBox​<double>
public sealed
NeuralNetCyclic

A version of Double.NeuralNetCyclic that utilises some vectorized operations for improved performance on hardware platforms that support them.

Functions
NeuralNetCyclic
public NeuralNetCyclic(
WeightedDirectedGraph<double> digraph,
VecFn2<double> activationFn,
int cyclesPerActivation
)

Constructs a cyclic neural network.

Parameters
digraph
WeightedDirectedGraph<double>

The weighted directed graph that defines the neural network structure and connection weights.

activationFn
VecFn2<double>

The neuron activation function to use at all neurons in the network.

cyclesPerActivation
int

The number of activation cycles to perform per overall activation of the cyclic network.

NeuralNetCyclic
public NeuralNetCyclic(
DirectedGraph digraph,
double[] weightArr,
VecFn2<double> activationFn,
int cyclesPerActivation
)

Constructs a cyclic neural network.

Parameters
digraph
DirectedGraph

The directed graph that defines the neural network structure.

weightArr
double[]

An array of neural network connection weights.

activationFn
VecFn2<double>

The neuron activation function to use at all neurons in the network.

cyclesPerActivation
int

The number of activation cycles to perform per overall activation of the cyclic network.

Properties
Inputs
public Memory<double> Inputs { get }

Gets a memory segment that represents a vector of input values.

Outputs
public Memory<double> Outputs { get }

Gets a memory segment that represents a vector of output values.

Functions
Activate
public void Activate()

Activate the network for a fixed number of iterations defined by the 'maxIterations' parameter at construction time. Activation reads input signals from InputSignalArray and writes output signals to OutputSignalArray.

Reset
public void Reset()

Reset the network's internal state.

Dispose
public void Dispose()
